com.group17.game.model.entity.enemy

Class Enemy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.group17.game.model.entity.enemy.Enemy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DumbFollowingEnemy, LineFollowingEnemy, SmartFollowingEnemy, WallFollowingEnemy

    public abstract class Enemy
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Parent abstract class for all enemy entities. Includes methods for core functionality of enemies.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Laurence Rawlings
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
